description: https://github.com/mnellemann/hmci/ - Metrics from IBM Power Systems

options.content:
## Metrics collected from IBM Power HMC
    
For more information visit: [github.com/mnellemann/hmci](https://github.com/mnellemann/hmci)

targets.query: SELECT last("id") AS "id", "type", "osType", "state", "affinityScore" FROM "lpar_details" WHERE ("lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lparname"

SELECT last("weight") AS "Weight", last("entitled_units") AS "Entitled", last("vp_units") AS "VP", (mean("utilized_units") / mean("entitled_units")) * 100 AS "Utilization",  last("mode") AS "Mode" FROM "vio_processor" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$system$/) AND ("vios" =~ /^$vios$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "vios" fill(previous)

SELECT mean("utilized_mb") / mean("assigned_mb") FROM "vio_memory" WHERE ("system"::tag =~ /^$system$/ AND "vios"::tag =~ /^$vios$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vios"::tag, "system"::tag fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system_processor" WITH KEY = "system" WHERE time > now() - 24h
list.label: System Name
list.name: system

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system_processor" WITH KEY = "system" WHERE time > now() - 24h

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vio_info" WITH KEY = "vios" WHERE system =~ /$system/ AND time > now() - 24h
list.label: Virtual I/O Server
list.name: vios

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vio_info" WITH KEY = "vios" WHERE system =~ /$system/ AND time > now() - 24h

title: HMCi - Power VIO Overview - InfluxDB
